messages.subject: medicating children
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/19/02 2:36:46 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/19/02 2:36:46 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I don't like having to medicate my child. >>

Then don't. There is no way that DSS can take your child from you based only
on the gfact that you refuse to medicate him. Did you check with a lawyer?
Did you check the laws?
Sounds like you got bullied or there is more to the story than you've shared
here.
I can refuse immunizations, I can refuse school, but you're telling me you
must medicate a child you don't want to?
At worst case, you get the prescription and throw it away. No one can force
you to put a substance in your child that you don't agree with.
I would move before that ever happened....I think you should check into a
lawyer.

Ren
